name: Hot Shoe
overview: Can you act fast enough to save the galaxy? This new 3D machine code game offers two exciting challenges. Can you guide your shuttle through the perilous asteroid belts? Can you help the Atomiser Man to reduce the ever-increasing radiation levels in the atomic piles? Not only are his toes in danger of scorching; groups of mutant atoms are thirsting for the energy in his back pack. Then there's Ron the Robot, a deadly foe, who's doing his best to undo all your good work.
